name: get_stream_game_name
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool gwyo_twitch.
Tool description: This API gives access to informations about a User / Channel, and Streams on Twitch.
API description: Get  Stream Game Name (by username or id)
( return an empty JSON object if not currently LIVE )

userid.description: The Twitch user ID for which to fetch the current game name.
